data.name: LEMURIA Demo
data.detailed_description:
LEMURIA is a spy adventure third-person shooter with gunfights, dialogues and numerous cutscenes. The action takes place against the backdrop of a migrant uprising and the onset of a deadly epidemic. When a civilization begins to collapse and its laws cease to operate, only the strong will survive!

Weapons, girls, cars, gold, uranium and wads of cash - what more could you want? Maybe a small SSD-drive with millions of stolen digital coins? No? Well, then the main prize is to get out of all this alive!

Main characters

The main characters of the game – an average guy Alex from a poor suburb and an aspiring Indian spy Kanta Anora - make their way to the African country of Lemuria, each for their own reason, each from their own end of the world, each in their own way. Who they will become - friends, enemies, lovers - we do not know. And neither do they.

Following his dreams, Alex manages to do a lot:
  • learn the peculiarities of building interpersonal relationships in conditions of limited funding;
  • help migrants to adapt in the metropolis using the methods adopted in their homeland;
  • solve personnel issues of municipal health care facilities and make the final diagnosis many a time;
  • once again prove that fat cats from micro-credit organizations are killed not by curiosity, but by greed;
  • be a policeman, pimp, safe cracker, philanthropist and DJ.

Meanwhile, Kanta Anora rejected the restrictions and prejudices of her compatriots and could (and most likely would) arrange an Armageddon when performing any, even the simplest, task.

Music

The game uses the music of two luminaries of game soundtracks - the endlessly varied Chris Onyak and the piercingly melodic John Leonard French. And we have developed a unique mixing system that allows this music to gently adjust to changes in gameplay.

AI

We spent a huge amount of time developing and customizing the NPC AI. Unfortunately or fortunately, the NPCs never found self-awareness, although they organized a union (but this is still unconfirmed). They learned to attack, retreat, shoot from cover, look for first-aid kits and ammunition, unite in groups and scatter in different directions, overcome obstacles and wait out of sight of the enemy.

And all this without pre-prepared triggers, which makes each battle unique and replayable.

Customizability

With a couple of clicks in the settings, the video sequence of the game can be changed in the range from prim melodrama for the whole family to the shamelessly unbridled VHS action movie of the 80s.

The rigidity of the image on the screen can be varied from a sharp TV camera to soft film.

Balance

The player can adjust both the ratio of the time of gunfights to the time of dialogues, and the complexity of these gunfights, according to their preference. It should be noted that in any case, tactical decisions will be more important than shooting accuracy. It is also important to note that this game discourages camping and fights against it with increased visibility and damage taken.


We tried to make the gameplay as varied as possible, and in each new location the player will most likely have to adopt new tactics. And with the correct settings, the game will move to the next stage 10 seconds before you the player tires of the current stage.

Key features

  • Alternating between playing as two completely different protagonists to avoid monotony;
  • Maximum realistic view;
  • Advanced enemy AI;
  • Dynamic, replayable battles, the outcome of which depends not only on accurate shooting, but also on tactical decisions;
  • Cinematic cutscenes;
  • Varied enemies and companions;
  • Realistic uncompromising stealth;
  • Interesting lively dialogues;
  • A variety of locations;
  • The player doesn't just go from point to point for a plot-imposed goal, but can solve annoying social problems along the way, such as aggressive migrants, poor medicine, and high credit interest rates;
  • Music by such masters as Chris Onyak and John Leonard French, dynamically adapted to the gameplay.

Conclusion

In addition to uncompromising firefights and rescuing the next “demoiselle en détresse”, the player will have a fair amount of stealth and a fantasy-style immersion into the depths of Kanta's subconscious beyond reality.

This game is a neat entertainment for a few nights, giving you the opportunity to shoot, talk, wander through the magical jungle and maybe do something else…

data.short_description: This is a spy adventure third-person shooter with gunfights, dialogues and numerous cutscenes. The action takes place against the backdrop of a migrant uprising and the onset of a deadly epidemic. When a civilization begins to collapse and its laws cease to operate, only the strong will survive!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Russian, Finnish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 560 Ti or similar in characteristics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Settings: Good
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i9-9900
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 or similar in characteristics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Settings: Fantastic. SSD is recommended.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice: The information and materials available on the Application are protected by copyright, trademark and other intellectual property rights owned by the providers of the relevant content. You are granted a limited revocable, non-transferable license to access and use the Materials solely through the App and solely for your personal, non-commercial use. Nothing contained in the Application grants or should be construed as granting you any license or right to commercially use any Materials or other copyrighted Content.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains adult themes and content that may not be suitable for all ages.
